summary: arning and Artificial Intelligence. iTabMenu is a tablet menu system designed specifically for the hospitality and retail industries. It offers features such as customizable themes, unlimited menu building and publishing, and an intuitive interface. iTabMenu is free for up to two tablet devices, and users can sign up to create an account and get started. The product is developed by the Karmaloop AI team, whose goal is to automate and digitize the hospitality and retail industries using technology.
